entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. Peter's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:29 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 10:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: NE 43 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
